info.name: Tumblr - Customizable Dark Theme
info.description: Simple dark reskin for Tumblr. Choose your own background and theme color!
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog -

2/1 ~
- Fixed radar...again...Tumblr make up your mind

30/12 ~
- Made some aesthetic changes to the dashboard menu
- Fixed the content transparency option (forgot about this :P)

19/12 ~
- Fixed themes page
- Added sytling to new Radar section

18/12 ~
- Added option to change content background
- Fixed unstylized elements when reblogging
- Fixed permalink thing

12/12 ~
- Added glossy nav icons
- Minor fixes

23/11 ~
- Quick cosmetic fixes for the search result page
- Prevented the userstyle from overwiting blog themes

22/11 ~ 
- Initial release
